about_the_game:
Experience an immersive VR experience with this exciting brain twister challenge.

Your goal is to correctly place the 3D shapes in the box as quickly as possible.

You can choose from 3 different difficulty levels and 3 different game modes to keep things interesting:

  • Single game mode: one random level, multiple difficulties.
  • Story mode: start with easy levels, and advance to more complex puzzles as you solve the challenges.
  • Challenge mode is required to accept a speed challenge. Pick 4 random levels for each difficulty, and try to solve them as quickly as possible.

Each game mode has its own leaderboard so you can compete with your friends or try to beat your own high score.

Stay tuned for exciting new future releases!
  • More Levels
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Steam Achievements
  • And much more coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
